mapper.select: SELECT i.policy_id, i.api_id, p.policy_name, p.policy_type, a.api_code, a.api_name, a.api_category, a.service_id, a.path, p.ip_address FROM gateway_ip_limit_api AS i INNER JOIN gateway_ip_limit AS p ON i.policy_id = p.policy_id INNER JOIN base_api AS a ON i.api_id = a.api_id where p.policy_type = 0
